dct_title_s: Study in human starvation; 2. Diets and deficiency diseases
dct_description_sm: American Geographical Society of New York. Alternate title on verso: Study in human starvation. Diets and deficiency diseases. Briesemeister elliptical equal-area projection. On upper right margin: Atlas of distribution of diseases - plate 9. Map 1. Selected nutritional-deficiency diseases (1:50,000,000) -- Map 2. Diets (1:100,000,000) -- Map 3. Distribution of vitamin deficiencies : South America (1:40,000,000) -- Map 4. Distribution of vitamin deficiencies : Africa (1:35,000,000) -- Map 5. Distribution of vitamin deficiencies : South Asia (1:30,000,000) -- Map 6. Diets of selected primitive tribes (1:133,000,000). Verso: Basic sources.
dct_publisher_sm: New York, NY : American Geographical Society, 1953.
